title: Ex - Prime Minister Khaleda Zia passes away
description: BNP Chairperson and former Prime Minister Begum Khaleda Zia has passed away while undergoing treatment at Evercare Hospital in Dhaka early Tuesday (December 30). She breather her last ataround 6:00am, confirmed BNP media cellin a Facebook post. Begum Khaleda Zia had been admitted to hospital on November 23 with breathing difficulties caused by a lung ...
